key.name: sb_depositFee

key.name: sb_withdrawFee
key.description: Fee ( in percent ) on bank withdrawls. ( Leave 0 for no fee )

key.description: Minimum amount required before fees are taken, advised to be 10 or more before fees are taken. ( Default: 100 )

key.name: sb_interestRequiredAmount
key.description: Minimum amount required before interest is given. ( Defaults at 100 )

key.description: Interest ( in percent relative to bank balance ) per day. ( Leave 0 for no interest )

key.description: Name of bank, shown in the banking module

key.description: Name that shows in the menu
